mapper.select:
select count(*) from free_board where bo_del_yn = 'N'
and bo_title like '%'|| #{boTitle} ||'%'
and bo_writer like '%'|| #{boWriter} ||'%'
and bo_content like '%'|| #{boContent} ||'%'
and bo_category = #{boCategory}

SELECT a.bo_num ,a.bo_category ,b.comm_nm as boCatNm ,a.bo_title ,a.bo_writer ,to_char(a.bo_reg_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as boRegDate ,to_char(a.bo_mod_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as boModDate ,a.bo_hit FROM free_board a left join comm_code b on( a.bo_category = b.comm_cd) where bo_del_yn = 'N'

select a.bo_num ,a.bo_category ,b.comm_nm as boCatNm ,a.bo_title ,a.bo_pass ,a.bo_writer ,a.bo_content ,a.bo_ip ,to_char(a.bo_reg_date,'YYYY.MM.DD HH:MM') as boRegDate ,to_char(a.bo_mod_date,'YYYY.MM.DD HH:MM') as boModDate ,a.bo_hit FROM free_board a,comm_code b where a.bo_category = b.comm_cd and bo_num = #{boNum} and bo_del_yn = 'N'
